law.catch_line: Contracts violating KRS 365.020 to 365.050 are void.
law.text: Any contract, express or implied, made in violation of any of the provisions of KRS 365.020 to 365.050 is an illegal contract and no recovery shall be had thereon.
law.history: Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 4748h-9.
